title: Whistle And I'll Come To You (BBC Omnibus 1968)
description:
M.R. James is one of the greatest writers of stories of the supernatural, and &#039;Oh Whistle And I&#039;ll Come To You, My Lad&#039; is one of his darkest works - a tale of solitude and terror, and the dangers of intellectual pride.

Made in 1968 for BBC Television&#039;s Omnibus programme, Jonathan Miller&#039;s adaptation succeeds in capturing the chill of terror at the heart of the story. The bleak Norfolk landscape is superbly photographed by Dick Bush to instill a sense of isolation and unease from the outset, and Michael Hordern&#039;s performance as the eccentric, grouchy professor is nothing short of brilliant.

The final scenes willl leave you with a shiver of horror you will not easily shake off...
